en: I'm a zero.
zh: 我就是个无名小卒。

en: I gotta try to do my best.
zh: 我得尽力而为。

en: I play in a band.
zh: 我在一个乐队里。

en: I have a strong backhand.
zh: 我的反手很强。

en: I'm playing a TV game.
zh: 我在玩电视游戏。

en: Alone in this world I'll be.
zh: 我会孤零零地活在这个世界上。

en: Boy I, I really must have passed out.
zh: 天哪，我肯定是晕过去了。

en: I've got something on you.
zh: 我有你的把柄。

en: I'm not going to be pushed around by you or anyone else.
zh: 我不会被你或者任何人摆布。

en: I'm just a boy who makes mistakes.
zh: 我只是个会犯错的男孩。

en: You cannot pull the wool over my eyes.
zh: 你骗不了我的。

en: I'm not talking to you; I'm talking to the monkey.
zh: 我没跟你说话，我在跟猴子说话。

en: Be my right-hand man.
zh: 做我的得力助手吧。

en: Don't worry about me.
zh: 别担心我。

en: I waver in my mind, a place just for me.
zh: 我在自己的内心世界里摇摆不定。

en: Won't you hear my thoughts?
zh: 你不想听听我的想法吗？

en: Don't put it on my desk.
zh: 别把它放在我桌子上。

en: My love has gone far away.
zh: 我的爱人已经远去了。

en: My papa said no.
zh: 我老爸不答应。

en: I love that chair.
zh: 我好喜欢那把椅子。

en: It's my CD.
zh: 这是我的CD。

en: Let me handle this.
zh: 让我来处理吧。

en: Are you talking to me?
zh: 你是在跟我说话吗？

en: Keep away from me.
zh: 离我远点。

en: It suits me.
zh: 这很适合我。

en: My job search is really going rough. I don't have any connections.
zh: 我找工作很不顺，又没门路。

en: I'm so unimportant and insignificant.
zh: 我是如此卑微而渺小。

en: I can hear the sound in your mind.
zh: 我能听到你的心声。

en: I can't do it.
zh: 我做不到。

en: I have a card up my sleeve.
zh: 我还有底牌。

en: You don't... you don't talk to me like that.
zh: 你别……你别那样跟我说话。

en: I am a lucky budgie, aren't I?
zh: 我真是只幸运的小鹦鹉，不是吗？

en: If I were prime minister, I'd give Clinton a good talking to.
zh: 如果我是首相，我会好好教训一下克林顿。

en: I feel something.
zh: 我有种感觉。

en: It's you I'll always love.
zh: 我永远爱的人是你。

en: Do you find it funny that I feel this way?
zh: 你觉得我有这种感觉很搞笑吗？

en: I have chubby fingers, so I can't use a small keyboard.
zh: 我手指肉肉的，用不了小键盘。

en: I prefer cakes or candies to alcohol, but I do drink.
zh: 比起喝酒我更喜欢吃甜点，不过我也喝酒。

en: I'd rather go by train. I have a license, but no real driving experience, so I'm not very sure of myself behind the wheel.
zh: 我宁愿坐火车。我有驾照但没怎么开过，开车上路我没底。

en: Lady Otohime gave Urashima Taro a beautiful Tamate-box.
zh: 乙姬公主给了浦岛太郎一个漂亮的玉手箱。

en: He makes young girls' hearts flutter.
zh: 他让年轻姑娘们心花怒放。

en: Any result obtained through the execution of the Commissioned Business shall belong to each party hereto.
zh: 因执行受托业务而产生的任何成果均归各方所有。

en: Oysters don't agree with me.
zh: 我一吃生蚝就不舒服。

en: His bread is buttered on both sides.
zh: 他的日子过得极滋润。

en: Cowards die many times before their deaths.
zh: 胆小鬼在真正死亡前已经死过很多次了。

en: With a weak beat, it continues to bleed.
zh: 伴着微弱的跳动，它还在流血。

en: The timid man trembled with fear.
zh: 那个胆小的人吓得直打哆嗦。

en: It was too nice a day to stay inside.
zh: 天气这么好，待在屋里太可惜了。

en: You can see for miles from the roof.
zh: 从屋顶上可以看到好几英里远。

en: Let's clear out the attic.
zh: 咱们把阁楼清理一下吧。

en: He says he must get rid of the mice that are in the attic.
zh: 他说他得把阁楼里的老鼠给处理掉。

en: Dust had accumulated in the attic.
zh: 阁楼里积了不少灰。

en: There's ample room in the attic.
zh: 阁楼里空间挺大的。

en: The roof was damaged by the storm.
zh: 房顶被暴风雨给弄坏了。

en: The roof is really in need of repair.
zh: 房顶真该修一修了。

en: The roof was blown off by the explosion.
zh: 房顶被爆炸给掀翻了。

en: The roof is shining in the sun.
zh: 房顶在阳光下闪闪发亮。

en: The roof was torn off by the gale.
zh: 房顶被大风给掀了。

en: The roof declines at a sharp angle.
zh: 房顶的坡度特别斜。

en: The roof was dripping.
zh: 房顶在滴水。

en: We have to clear the snow off the roof.
zh: 我们得把房顶上的雪扫一下。

en: That house, the roof of which is red, is my uncle's.
zh: 那个红房顶的房子是我叔叔的。

en: Look at the house with the red roof.
zh: 你看那座红房顶的房子。

en: I saw the moon above the roof.
zh: 我看见月亮挂在房顶上。

en: I see a bird on the roof.
zh: 我看见房顶上有一只鸟。

en: The bird on the roof is a crow.
zh: 房顶上那只鸟是只乌鸦。

en: I cleared the roof of snow.
zh: 我把房顶上的雪给清了。

en: What is the name of the building whose roof you can see?
zh: 能看见房顶的那个建筑叫什么名字？

en: The house whose roof you can see is Mr Baker's.
zh: 能看见房顶的那座房子是贝克先生的。

en: Rain was pattering on the roof.
zh: 雨点啪嗒啪嗒地打在房顶上。

en: The staircase leading to the rooftop is narrow, steep, and dark.
zh: 通往天台的楼梯又窄又陡，还黑咕隆咚的。

en: What is that building with the green roof?
zh: 那个绿房顶的建筑是什么？

en: The house whose roof is green is mine.
zh: 绿房顶的那间房子是我的。

en: The house with the damaged roof has been repaired.
zh: 房顶坏了的那座房子已经修好了。

en: That's Tom's house with the red roof.
zh: 那是汤姆的房子，就是那个红房顶的。

en: The tile which fell from the roof broke into pieces.
zh: 从房顶掉下来的瓦片摔得粉碎。

en: We saw the bird when we visited Okinawa.
zh: 我们去冲绳旅游的时候见过这种鸟。

en: How many hours does it take to go to Okinawa by plane?
zh: 坐飞机去冲绳要几个小时？

en: Are you aware that Okinawa is closer to China than to Honshu?
zh: 你知道冲绳离中国比离本州还近吗？

en: Okinawa has a fine climate all year round.
zh: 冲绳一年四季气候都很好。

en: How long does it take to reach Okinawa?
zh: 去冲绳要多久？

en: Is Okayama a big city?
zh: 冈山是个大城市吗？

en: I've never been beyond Okayama.
zh: 我最远只去过冈山。

en: Who's the girl in a yellow raincoat?
zh: 穿黄色雨衣的那个女孩是谁？

en: There is a yellow rose.
zh: 这儿有一朵黄玫瑰。

en: The king turned out to be naked.
zh: 结果国王竟然什么也没穿。

en: There's a rich man sleeping on a golden bed.
zh: 有个富翁睡在金子上做的床上。

en: The king will appear in person tomorrow evening.
zh: 国王明晚会亲自露面。

en: The King invited not only us but also a lot of other people.
zh: 国王不仅请了我们，还请了好多其他人。

en: The king ordered that the prisoner should be set free.
zh: 国王下令释放了那个囚犯。

en: The king went hunting this morning.
zh: 国王今天早上去打猎了。

en: Long live the King!
zh: 国王万岁！

en: The queen stood beside the king.
zh: 王后站在国王身边。

en: The princess couldn't help laughing at him.
zh: 公主忍不住嘲笑他。

en: The royal wedding was a great spectacle.
zh: 那场王室婚礼场面非常壮观。

en: The royal family lives in the Imperial Palace.
zh: 皇室成员住在皇宫里。

en: The prince bowed down to Snow White.
zh: 王子向白雪公主鞠了一躬。

en: The prince was changed into a frog.
zh: 王子变成了一只青蛙。

en: The prince fell in love with a woodcutter's daughter.
zh: 王子爱上了一个樵夫的女儿。

en: The prince was changed into a tree by magic.
zh: 王子被魔法变成了一棵树。

en: The prince was turned by magic into a frog.
zh: 王子被魔法变成了一只青蛙。

en: The prince has set out on a long journey.
zh: 王子出发去远行了。

en: The prince was lost in the woods.
zh: 王子在树林里迷路了。

en: The prince made it known all over the land that he would marry the poor girl.
zh: 王子向全国宣布，他要娶那个穷人家的姑娘。

en: The prince was confined in the castle for three years.
zh: 王子被关在城堡里整整三年。

en: The prince succeeded to the throne.
zh: 王子继承了王位。

en: Kingdoms and small countries then developed.
zh: 后来，大大小小的王国和国家发展了起来。

en: I succeed to the throne.
zh: 我继承了王位。

en: There was a time when kings and queens reigned over the world.
zh: 曾经有过一段国王和王后统治世界的时期。

en: The knight swore an oath of allegiance to the king.
zh: 骑士向国王宣誓效忠。

en: The king created him a peer.
zh: 国王封他为贵族。

en: The king crushed his enemies.
zh: 国王铲除了他的敌人。

en: The king was famous for his splendid palace.
zh: 国王因为他那座华丽的宫殿而闻名。

en: The king imposed heavy taxes on the people.
zh: 国王向百姓征收重税。

en: The king exacted taxes from his people.
zh: 国王强行向百姓征税。

en: The king was executed.
zh: 国王被处死了。

en: The king ruled his kingdom justly.
zh: 国王公正地治理着他的王国。

en: The king imposed heavy taxes on his people.
zh: 国王对他的百姓课以重税。

en: The king abused his power.
zh: 国王滥用了他的权力。

en: The king was stripped of his power.
zh: 国王的权力被剥夺了。

en: The king was shorn of his power.
zh: 国王失去了他的权势。

en: The King was assaulted by terrorists.
zh: 国王遭到了恐怖分子的袭击。

en: The king was greatly entertained by the music.
zh: 音乐让国王听得很开心。

en: The king subjected all the tribes to his rule.
zh: 国王让所有部落都服从他的统治。

en: Kings have long arms.
zh: 国王的手伸得很长。

en: What the king says is always absolute.
zh: 国王的话就是圣旨。

en: The royal palace was built on a hill.
zh: 皇宫建在了一座小山上。

en: Mr. Oh came to Japan to study Japanese.
zh: 吴先生来日本学习日语。

en: Mr Wang is from China.
zh: 王先生是中国人。

en: The king governed the country.
zh: 国王治理着这个国家。

en: In Europe and America, people regard punctuality as a matter of course.
zh: 在欧美，大家觉得准时是理所当然的事。

en: In Europe and America they regard the dog as a member of the family.
zh: 在欧美，人们把狗当作家人看待。

en: European currencies weakened against the dollar.
zh: 欧洲货币对美元走弱了。

en: The EC's Twelve are working out a compromise on farm-price.
zh: 欧共体十二国正在商讨关于农产品价格的妥协方案。

en: Learning lessons from Europe, Japan has to switch its economic-oriented policy to a consumer-conscious one, in order to cope with the coming unprecedented aging society towards the 21st century.
zh: 日本得吸取欧洲的教训，把以经济为中心的政策转向关注消费者，这样才能应对21世纪前所未有的老龄化社会。

en: Is this the right way to Yokohama Station?
zh: 请问去横滨站是走这条路吗？

en: Yokohama is a beautiful port town.
zh: 横滨是一个美丽的港口城市。

en: Yokohama is one of the largest cities in Japan.
zh: 横滨是日本最大的城市之一。

en: Yokohama is the second largest city in Japan.
zh: 横滨是日本第二大城市。

en: Yokohama is the city in Japan with the second largest population.
zh: 横滨是日本人口第二多的城市。

en: The population of Yokohama is larger than that of Osaka.
zh: 横滨的人口比大阪还要多。

en: Yokohama is a city where more than three million people live.
zh: 横滨是一个住着三百多万人的城市。

en: A car lying on its side blocked the passage.
zh: 一辆侧翻的车挡住了去路。

en: I sleep on my side.
zh: 我习惯侧着睡。

en: Lie down and rest for a while.
zh: 躺下歇会儿吧。

en: Lie down and make yourself comfortable.
zh: 躺下来，怎么舒服怎么来。

en: We found the beds quite comfortable.
zh: 我们觉得这床睡着挺舒服的。

en: Don't cut in with your remarks.
zh: 别插话。

en: Push the button, please.
zh: 请按一下按钮。

en: The door gave to my pressure.
zh: 我一使劲，门就开了。

en: Push the door open.
zh: 把门推开。

en: Delete his name from the list of the applicants.
zh: 从申请名单里把他的名字删了。

en: Applicants were requested to submit their resumes.
zh: 申请人都被要求交简历。

en: Applicants must be under thirty years old.
zh: 申请人必须在三十岁以下。

en: Apply within.
zh: 进屋里申请吧。

en: I need first aid.
zh: 我需要急救。

en: Is there anybody who knows first aid?
zh: 有人会急救吗？

en: I want to go and cheer.
zh: 我想去加加油。

en: Please back me up!
zh: 帮我撑下腰！

en: I'm really irritable lately. My favorite soccer team is in a slump.
zh: 我最近特别烦，我喜欢的球队表现太差了。

en: Did you buy a round trip ticket?
zh: 你买往返票了吗？

en: I bought a round-trip ticket.
zh: 我买的是往返票。

en: What's the round-trip fare?
zh: 往返票多少钱？

en: I got slapped on both cheeks.
zh: 我两边脸都被扇了巴掌。

en: Round trip or one-way?
zh: 往返还是单程？

en: Is your wife a good cook?
zh: 你老婆做饭好吃吗？

en: How's your wife?
zh: 你老婆还好吗？

en: Please say hello to your wife for me.
zh: 替我向你老婆问个好。

en: Send my greetings to your wife.
zh: 帮我问候下你老婆。

en: May I take your size, madam?
zh: 女士，请问您的尺寸是多少？

en: I'd like to speak to the lady of the household.
zh: 我想跟这家的女主人谈谈。

en: Where's your better half?
zh: 你那位呢？

en: My back tooth has chipped.
zh: 我的大牙崩掉了一块。

en: How is the wife?
zh: 你老婆怎么样？

en: How can you be so indifferent to your wife's trouble?
zh: 你怎么能对你老婆的麻烦这么不闻不问？

en: His wife leads him by the nose.
zh: 他被他老婆牵着鼻子走。

en: Please say hello to your wife.
zh: 请代我向你老婆问好。

en: After his wife left him, Harold went nuts.
zh: 老婆离开他以后，哈罗德就疯了。

en: It's an awful shame your wife couldn't come.
zh: 你老婆没能来，真是太可惜了。

en: When his wife died, he received dozens of letters of sympathy.
zh: 他老婆去世的时候，他收到了几十封慰问信。

en: I think his wife is going out of town.
zh: 我觉得他老婆要出远门。

en: Your wife is mad at you.
zh: 你老婆在生你的气呢。

en: Imagine that you have a wife.
zh: 想象一下你有个老婆。

en: My nephew was accustomed to sitting up late.
zh: 我侄子习惯熬夜。

en: A nephew is a son of one's brother or sister.
zh: 侄子或外甥就是兄弟姐妹的儿子。

en: Pollution has a disastrous effect on the ecology of a region.
zh: 污染对一个地区的生态环境有毁灭性的影响。

en: As a result of pollution, the lake is without any form of life.
zh: 因为污染，这湖里已经没有任何生物了。

en: Pollution is damaging our earth.
zh: 污染正在破坏我们的地球。

en: Down with corrupt politicians.
zh: 打倒腐败的政客。

en: Shall I help you with washing-up?
zh: 要我帮你洗碗吗？

en: Please clean the dirty floor.
zh: 把那脏地板擦擦。

en: Never rub the eyes when the hands are dirty.
zh: 手脏的时候千万别揉眼睛。

en: You may take the book home so long as you don't get it dirty.
zh: 只要不弄脏，你可以把书带回家。

en: You may take this book as long as you keep it clean.
zh: 只要能保持干净，这书你就可以拿去。

en: Don't handle my books with dirty hands.
zh: 别用脏手碰我的书。

en: You should clean your dirty room.
zh: 你该打扫一下你那脏屋子了。

en: When the trusted confidant of the person who conducted a hostile takeover of the company betrayed him, it was a sort of retributive justice.
zh: 那个恶意收购公司的人被心腹出卖，也算是遭了报应。

en: I saw a dirty dog coming into the garden.
zh: 我看到一只脏兮兮的狗进了花园。

en: Don't wash your dirty linen in public.
zh: 家丑不可外扬。

en: Maintaining a high salt diet may contribute to high blood pressure.
zh: 长期重口味高盐饮食可能会导致高血压。

en: How do you feel?
zh: 你感觉怎么样？

en: Salt water is more buoyant than fresh water.
zh: 盐水的浮力比淡水大。

en: Did you put in any salt?
zh: 你放盐了吗？

en: Would you be kind enough to pass the salt?
zh: 麻烦把盐递给我一下，好吗？

en: Pass me the salt, please.
zh: 请把盐递给我。

en: Will you pass me the salt?
zh: 你能把盐递给我吗？

en: If you are done with the salt, please pass it to me.
zh: 你要是用完盐了，请把它递给我。

en: Pass me the salt, will you?
zh: 把盐递给我一下，行吗？

en: Would you pass me the salt?
zh: 能帮我拿一下盐吗？

en: Can you pass me the salt, please?
zh: 麻烦能把盐递给我吗？

en: He asked me to pass him the salt.
zh: 他让我把盐递给他。

en: Would you pass me the salt, please?
zh: 麻烦能帮我递一下盐吗？

en: The addition of salt greatly improved the flavor.
zh: 加了盐之后味道好多了。

en: The excessive use of salt should be taboo.
zh: 盐放太多可是个大忌。

en: Could you pass me the salt, please?
zh: 麻烦把盐递给我一下，好吗？

en: Please pass me the salt.
zh: 请把盐递给我。

en: Pass me the salt, would you?
zh: 帮我递一下盐，行吗？

en: Would you pass the salt, please?
zh: 麻烦递一下盐。

en: Salt is necessary for a cook.
zh: 厨师少不了盐。

en: Salt is necessary for cooking.
zh: 做菜离不开盐。

en: Salt is a useful substance.
zh: 盐挺有用的。

en: Salt is sold by weight.
zh: 盐是按重量卖的。

en: Salt is used to season food.
zh: 盐是用来给食物调味的。

en: Salt helps stop food from perishing.
zh: 盐有助于防止食物变质。

en: Salt helps to preserve food from decay.
zh: 盐能防止食物腐烂。

en: Salt preserves fish from decay.
zh: 盐能防止鱼腐烂。

en: We cannot do without salt even for a single day.
zh: 我们一天也离不开盐。

en: Pass me the salt and pepper, please.
zh: 请把盐和胡椒粉递给我。

en: We season with salt.
zh: 我们用盐调味。

en: I wanted some salt, but there was none in the jar.
zh: 我想要点盐，但罐子里没了。

en: Is there any salt left?
zh: 还有盐吗？

en: There is no salt left.
zh: 没盐了。

en: He should have bought some pencils.
zh: 他本该买些铅笔的。

en: Put down your pencil.
zh: 把铅笔放下。

en: Put down your pencil and listen to me.
zh: 把铅笔放下，听我说。

en: May I use your pencil? Any one will do.
zh: 我可以用下你的铅笔吗？哪支都行。

en: How many dozen pencils do you have?
zh: 你有几打铅笔？

en: I bought a dozen pencils today.
zh: 我今天买了一打铅笔。

en: I've lost my pencil.
zh: 我把铅笔弄丢了。

en: I have lost my pencil.
zh: 我的铅笔丢了。

en: Have you got a pencil?
zh: 你有铅笔吗？

en: Pencils are sold by the dozen.
zh: 铅笔是按打卖的。

en: The point of the pencil has become dull.
zh: 铅笔头秃了。

en: Please write with a pencil.
zh: 请用铅笔写。

en: Write with a pen, not with a pencil.
zh: 用钢笔写，别用铅笔。

en: Please write your name with a pencil.
zh: 请用铅笔写你的名字。

en: I need a pencil. Can I use one of yours?
zh: 我需要支铅笔，能用一下你的吗？

en: My pencil fell off the edge of my desk.
zh: 我的铅笔从桌子边上掉下去了。

en: Please give me a pencil and some sheets of paper.
zh: 请给我一支铅笔和几张纸。

en: Lead bends easily.
zh: 铅很容易弯曲。

en: Which is heavier, lead or gold?
zh: 铅和金子，哪个更重？

en: Thank you very much for coming so far as see me off.
zh: 谢谢你跑这么远来送我。

en: How kind you are to come all the way to see me off!
zh: 你大老远跑来送我，人真是太好了！

en: Thank you very much for coming so far to see me off.
zh: 非常感谢你跑这么远来送我。

en: Go ahead and talk.
zh: 你说吧。

en: Please feel free to use my dictionary.
zh: 我的词典你随便用。

en: Please feel free to ask me questions.
zh: 有什么问题尽管问。

en: Please feel free to express yourself.
zh: 尽管表达你的想法。

en: I'll give you a piece of my mind.
zh: 我要好好说说你。

en: Please help yourself to the cake.
zh: 别客气，吃点蛋糕吧。

en: Don't be shy about talking to the teacher; if you don't understand, use some initiative!
zh: 别不好意思跟老师说话，要是不懂，就主动点！

en: Never hesitate to have time off whenever you want.
zh: 想请假的时候尽管请。

en: Don't hold back.
zh: 别客气。

en: Don't hesitate to ask for advice.
zh: 有问题尽管请教。

en: Not really. I like hiking better than fishing.
zh: 倒也不是，比起钓鱼，我更喜欢徒步。

en: We were glad when we saw a light in the distance.
zh: 看到远处有灯光，我们挺高兴的。

en: We felt relieved when we saw a light in the distance.
zh: 看到远处有灯光，我们就放心了。

en: We saw a castle in the distance.
zh: 我们看到远处有一座城堡。

en: We saw a little light in the distance.
zh: 我们看到远处有一点微光。

en: I saw a town in the distance.
zh: 我看到远处有一个小镇。

en: In the distance there stood a dimly white lighthouse.
zh: 远处立着一座白蒙蒙的灯塔。

en: We can see the island in the distance.
zh: 我们能看到远处的那个岛。

en: It's hard to get to by bike because it's far away.
zh: 那儿太远了，骑车很难到。

en: The picnic was called off because of the rain.
zh: 因为下雨，野餐取消了。

en: The picture looks strange because it has no perspective.
zh: 这画看起来怪怪的，因为没透视感。

en: I'm afraid my depth perception is very poor.
zh: 我估计我空间感挺差的。

en: Please stop beating around the bush and come straight to the point.
zh: 别绕圈子了，直说吧。

en: Don't beat about the bush.
zh: 别拐弯抹角的。

en: Don't beat around the bush; tell me who is to blame.
zh: 别兜圈子了，告诉我该怪谁。

en: Stop beating around the bush and get to the point.
zh: 别绕弯子了，说重点。

en: Stop beating around the bush and tell me what happened.
zh: 别磨叽了，快说发生什么了。

en: Instead of beating around the bush, Jones got straight to the point.
zh: 琼斯没绕圈子，而是开门见山直奔主题。

en: I sounded him out about his views.
zh: 我试探了一下他的看法。

en: I had not gone far before it began to rain.
zh: 我没走多远就开始下雨了。

en: We had not gone far before we saw the road blocked by a truck.
zh: 我们没走多远，就看到路被一辆卡车堵住了。

en: We can see distant objects with a telescope.
zh: 用望远镜能看到远处的东西。

en: Distant things look blurred.
zh: 远处的景物看起来很模糊。

en: I saw a house in the distance.
zh: 我看到远处有一间房子。

en: Reach out and touch someone.
zh: 多跟人联系联系吧。

en: I saw a light far away.
zh: 我看到远处有一道光。

en: I saw land in the distance.
zh: 我看到远处有陆地。

en: We can see Mt. Fuji in the distance.
zh: 我们能看到远处的富士山。

en: Mt. Fuji could be seen in the distance.
zh: 远处可以看到富士山。

en: I saw a light in the distance.
zh: 我看到远处有灯光。

en: I could see Tokyo Tower far away.
zh: 我能看到远处的东京塔。

en: We saw an island in the distance.
zh: 我们看到远处有个岛。

en: We saw the tower in the distance.
zh: 我们看到远处的那座塔了。

en: We saw a bird in the distance.
zh: 我们看到远处有一只鸟。

en: We could see the lights of the town in the distance.
zh: 我们能看到远处小镇的灯光。

en: We could see the ship in the distance.
zh: 我们能看到远处那艘船。

en: I saw a cottage in the distance.
zh: 我远远地看见了一座小木屋。

en: Shots were heard in the distance.
zh: 远处传来了枪声。

en: We saw a mountain in the distance.
zh: 我们远远地看见了一座山。

en: You can see the ancient ruins in the distance.
zh: 远处能看到那些古遗址。

en: A church spire could be seen in the distance.
zh: 远处能看到教堂的尖顶。

en: A fire was seen to blaze up far away.
zh: 远处看到火烧了起来。

en: There was something moving in the distance.
zh: 远处有什么东西在动。

en: We saw a dim light in the distance.
zh: 我们远远地看到一点微弱的光。

en: I made out a tower in the distance.
zh: 我隐约看到远处有一座塔。

en: I heard it thunder in the distance.
zh: 我听见远处在打雷。

en: Little lights were blinking on and off in the distance.
zh: 远处有点点灯光忽明忽暗。

en: We heard shots in the distance.
zh: 我们听到远处有枪声。

en: They heard a gun go off in the distance.
zh: 他们听到远处传来了枪响。

en: We heard tigers roaring in the distance.
zh: 我们听见远处有老虎在吼。

en: Can you see far?
zh: 你看得远吗？

en: I heard someone calling me from a distance.
zh: 我听到远处有人在叫我。

en: I saw a figure approaching in the distance.
zh: 我看到远处有个身影正走过来。

en: Seen from a distance, the hill looks like an elephant.
zh: 远远看去，那座山就像头大象。

en: Seen from a distance, it looked like a human face.
zh: 远远看去，它长得像张人脸。

en: Seen from distance, the rock looked like a human face.
zh: 远远看去，那块石头像张人脸。

en: Viewed from a distance, the island looked like a cloud.
zh: 远看那个岛就像一朵云。

en: Seen from a distance, the big rock looks like an old castle.
zh: 远远看去，那块大石头就像座古堡。

en: Seen from a distance, the stone looks like a human face.
zh: 远远看去，这块石头很像人脸。

en: Seen from a distance, this mountain looks like Mt. Fuji.
zh: 远远看去，这座山很像富士山。

en: The small island looked like a tortoise from a distance.
zh: 远远看去，那个小岛像只乌龟。

en: In the distance you can see Mt. Fuji through the morning mist.
zh: 透过晨雾，可以看见远处的富士山。

en: We saw the gleam of a distant lighthouse.
zh: 我们看到了远处灯塔闪烁的光芒。

en: There were almost no railroads out west.
zh: 西部那时候几乎没有什么铁路。

en: Thank you very much for coming all the way to see me.
zh: 谢谢你大老远跑来看我。

en: I heard a dog barking in the distance.
zh: 我听到远处有狗叫。

en: Marriage is made in heaven.
zh: 姻缘天注定。

en: Marriages are made in heaven.
zh: 婚姻都是老天爷安排好的。

en: It's bad luck to say that.
zh: 说那个不吉利。

en: Even the worthy Homer sometimes nods.
zh: 智者千虑，必有一失。

en: He is an unsung hero.
zh: 他是个无名英雄。

en: Monkeys climb trees.
zh: 猴子会爬树。

en: Don't be a copycat.
zh: 别当学人精。

en: He was scared when the monkey jumped at him.
zh: 猴子扑向他的时候，他被吓了一跳。

en: Monkeys can learn a lot of tricks.
zh: 猴子能学会很多把戏。

en: The monkeys are grooming each other.
zh: 猴子们正在互相捉虱子。

en: It is easy for a monkey to climb a tree.
zh: 猴子爬树很容易。

en: A monkey is climbing up a tall tree.
zh: 一只猴子正在往高树上爬。

en: The forest is teeming with monkeys.
zh: 森林里到处都是猴子。

en: A chimney carries smoke from a fireplace to the outside.
zh: 烟囱把壁炉里的烟排到外面。

en: The chimney began to give out smoke.
zh: 烟囱开始冒烟了。

en: Black smoke came out of the chimney.
zh: 烟囱里冒出了黑烟。

en: Smoke was rising from the chimney.
zh: 烟囱里正冒着烟。

en: Smoke is rising from the chimney.
zh: 烟囱正往外冒烟。

en: The smoke poured out of the chimney.
zh: 浓烟从烟囱里涌了出来。

en: Keep your cigarettes dry.
zh: 烟得放干爽点。

en: Please put your cigarette out.
zh: 把烟掐了。

en: Smoking is harmful to the health.
zh: 吸烟有害健康。

en: Smoking is a bad habit.
zh: 抽烟是个坏习惯。

en: Too much smoking tends to injure the voice.
zh: 烟抽多了伤嗓子。

en: Avoid smoking excessively.
zh: 别抽太多烟。

en: You'd better break off smoking.
zh: 你最好把烟戒了。

en: Smoking is harmful to your health.
zh: 抽烟对身体不好。

en: How many cigarettes am I allowed to take back duty free?
zh: 我能带多少免税烟回来？

en: I have a sore throat because of too much smoking.
zh: 烟抽多了，我嗓子疼。

en: Will you give me a light?
zh: 借个火？

en: Don't forget to extinguish your cigarette.
zh: 别忘了把烟掐灭。

en: Smoking began to tell on his health.
zh: 抽烟开始影响他的健康了。

en: The smoke ascended into the air.
zh: 烟雾升到了空中。

en: The smoke went upward through the chimney.
zh: 烟顺着烟囱上去了。

en: There is no fire without smoke.
zh: 没火哪来的烟。

en: Where there is smoke there is fire.
zh: 无风不起浪。

en: The smoke made our eyes water.
zh: 烟熏得我们直流眼泪。

en: I can't be around smoke.
zh: 我闻不了烟味。

en: The smoke blew away.
zh: 烟散了。

en: The smoke is rising in the air.
zh: 烟正往上升。

en: Turn the flame down low.
zh: 把火关小点。

en: Fire devoured the forest.
zh: 大火吞噬了森林。

en: The concert began with a piano solo.
zh: 音乐会以钢琴独奏开场。

en: Concert tickets are on sale at this office.
zh: 这儿的办公室卖音乐会门票。

en: There was a large audience at the concert.
zh: 音乐会观众很多。

en: After the concert, the crowd made for the nearest door.
zh: 音乐会结束后，人群涌向最近的出口。

en: The concert is about to start.
zh: 音乐会快开始了。

en: I'm all in a dither about the concert.
zh: 想到那场音乐会我就紧张得不行。

en: The audience clapped when the concert was over.
zh: 演出结束时观众鼓了掌。

en: The performance was almost over.
zh: 演出快结束了。

en: It's a lot of fun making people laugh while giving a speech.
zh: 演讲时把大家逗乐挺有意思的。

en: The speaker tried to incite the people to rebellion.
zh: 演讲者试图煽动人们造反。

en: The speaker aroused the anger of the audience.
zh: 演讲者激怒了观众。

en: The speaker swaggered into the lecture hall.
zh: 演讲者大摇大摆地走进了讲堂。

en: François gave a speech.

en: The speaker banged the table with his fist.
zh: 演讲者用拳头猛砸桌子。

en: I had little time to prepare the speech.
zh: 我没啥时间准备演讲。

en: A person giving a speech should stand where everyone can see him.
zh: 演讲的人应该站在大家都能看到的地方。

en: The speaker should stand where everyone can see him.
zh: 演讲者应该站在大家都能看到的地方。

en: I got more and more bored as the speech went on.
zh: 演讲越听越无聊。

en: We're going to the theater.
zh: 我们要去剧院。

en: I'd like to see a play. Do you have any information?
zh: 我想看场话剧，你有啥信息吗？

en: Do you enjoy plays, films, and such?
zh: 你喜欢话剧、电影之类的吗？

en: Action!
zh: 开始！

en: The coast was warned against a tsunami.
zh: 海岸发布了海啸预警。

en: Sail along the coast.
zh: 沿着海岸航行。

en: Nobody else offered to help.
zh: 没别人主动说要帮忙。

en: His pride didn't allow him to ask for help.
zh: 他的自尊心让他没法开口求助。

en: I need somebody to help me.
zh: 我需要有人帮帮我。

en: I am very grateful to you for your help.
zh: 非常感谢你的帮助。

en: Hatred is never appeased by hatred in this world.
zh: 在这个世界上，恨是化解不了恨的。

en: There was a continuous line of cars.
zh: 车子排成了长龙。

en: Procrastination is the thief of time.
zh: 拖延就是浪费时间。

en: The banquet was in full swing.
zh: 宴会正进行得热火朝天。

en: And the master of the banquet tested the water that had been turned into wine.
zh: 宴席主管尝了尝那变成了酒的水。

en: Gardening has been popular for some years.
zh: 园艺已经流行好几年了。

en: Can you give me the definition of a cone?
zh: 你能跟我说说圆锥的定义吗？

en: The Maruyama river flows through Kinosaki.
zh: 圆山川流过城崎。

en: Maruyama Park is a place where a lot of people gather.
zh: 圆山公园是很多人聚集的地方。

en: The strong yen was advantageous to our company.
zh: 日元升值对我们公司很有利。

en: The strong yen is acting against Japan's export industry.
zh: 日元走强对日本的出口业不利。

en: How to overcome the high value of the yen is a big problem.
zh: 怎么应对日元高估是个大问题。

en: The strong yen was a fatal blow to the company.
zh: 日元升值对那家公司来说是致命的打击。

en: The yen is rising and the dollar is falling.
zh: 日元在涨，美元在跌。

en: The influence of the strong yen on the Japanese economy has become very serious.
zh: 日元走强对日本经济的影响已经非常严重了。

en: The yen's appreciation accelerated the decline of that company.
zh: 日元升值加速了那家公司的衰落。

en: Does depreciation of the yen give rise to inflation?
zh: 日元贬值会导致通货膨胀吗？

en: Draw a circle.
zh: 画个圆。

en: The yen is still low against the dollar.
zh: 日元兑美元的汇率还是挺低的。

en: Can I exchange yen for dollars here?
zh: 这里可以把日元换成美元吗？

en: I exchanged yen for dollars.
zh: 我把日元换成了美元。

en: Is there a bank where I can exchange yen for dollars?
zh: 这附近有可以把日元换成美元的银行吗？

en: Please exchange yen for dollars.
zh: 请帮我把日元换成美元。

en: The yen is weaker than the dollar.
zh: 日元比美元弱。

en: The yen rose to the dollar.
zh: 日元兑美元汇率上涨了。

en: The yen appreciated 10 percent against the dollar.
zh: 日元兑美元升值了10%。

en: The yen was revalued upward against the U.S. dollar from a rate of 360 yen against the dollar to 308 yen on December 18, 1971.
zh: 1971年12月18日，日元兑美元汇率从360比1上调到了308比1。

en: The value of the yen has risen greatly.
zh: 日元大幅升值了。

en: The value of the yen has soared.
zh: 日元汇率飙升。

en: I'd like to know the exact exchange rate for yen.
zh: 我想知道日元的精确汇率。

en: The yen is expected to lose value against the dollar.
zh: 预计日元兑美元会贬值。

en: The bookstore across from the station is very large.
zh: 车站对面的那家书店很大。

en: I heard someone in the crowd outside the station call my name.
zh: 我听到车站外的人群里有人叫我的名字。

en: There is a bank in front of the station.
zh: 车站前面有一家银行。

en: There is a large parking lot in front of the station.
zh: 车站前面有个很大的停车场。

en: A lot of bicycles are illegally parked in front of the station.
zh: 车站前面乱停了很多自行车。

en: I ran into an old friend of mine outside the station.
zh: 我在车站外面碰到了一个老朋友。

en: I got a taxi in front of the station.
zh: 我在车站门口打了一辆出租车。

en: It's foolish taking a taxi when you can easily walk to the station.
zh: 走路去车站很近，打车太傻了。

en: It's too far to walk to the station, so let's take a bus.
zh: 走路去车站太远了，咱们坐公交吧。

en: It is about ten minutes' walk to the station.
zh: 走路去车站大约要十分钟。

en: How long does it take to walk to the station?
zh: 走路去车站要多久？

en: Shall we walk to the station?
zh: 我们要不走路去车站吧？

en: It's an hour's walk to the station.
zh: 走去车站要花一个小时。

en: It's ten minutes' walk to the station.
zh: 走去车站只要十分钟。

en: We ran on as far as the station.
zh: 我们一直跑到了车站。

en: I had to run to the station.
zh: 我不得不跑着去车站。

en: Can you give me a ride to the station?
zh: 你能捎我一段去车站吗？

en: Let me give you a lift as far as the station.
zh: 我顺路送你去车站吧。

en: Will you give me a lift to the station?
zh: 你能开车送我去车站吗？

en: Could you give me a lift to the train station?
zh: 你能捎我一段到火车站吗？

en: How long will it take me to walk to the station?
zh: 走路去火车站要多久？

en: It is no more than a mile to the station.
zh: 到车站不到一英里。

en: It's a long way to the station.
zh: 去车站挺远的。

en: It's about ten minutes to the station by bus.
zh: 坐公交去火车站大概要十分钟。

en: How far is it to the station?
zh: 到车站有多远？

en: The station is pretty far.
zh: 车站挺远的。

en: It is more than 3 kilometers to the station.
zh: 到火车站有三公里多。

en: I rode with her as far as the station.
zh: 我搭她的车一直坐到车站。

en: Could you please tell me how to get to the station?
zh: 能请你告诉我去火车站怎么走吗？

en: Will you tell me the way to the station?
zh: 能告诉我去车站的路怎么走吗？

en: Please be so kind as to show me the way to the station.
zh: 麻烦您指一下去车站的路。

en: I don't feel up to running to the station.
zh: 我不想跑着去车站。

en: It will take me 20 minutes to get to the station by taxi.
zh: 打车去车站要20分钟。

en: I managed to catch the 8 o'clock train by running all the way to the station.
zh: 我一路跑去车站，总算赶上了8点的火车。

en: I'll show you to the station.
zh: 我带你去车站吧。

en: We arranged that a car meet you at the station.
zh: 我们安排了车去车站接你。

en: I'll accompany you to the station.
zh: 我陪你去车站吧。

en: I will go along with you as far as the station.
zh: 我会陪你一直走到车站。

en: Can you give me a lift to the station?
zh: 能捎我去车站吗？

en: Allow an hour to get to the station.
zh: 去车站得留出一个小时的时间。

en: It takes you an hour to go to the station on foot.
zh: 走路去车站要一个小时。

en: Could you give me a ride to the station?

zh: 英语对我来说挺难的。

en: English has become my favorite subject.
zh: 英语成了我最喜欢的科目。

en: English is a very important language in today's world.
zh: 在当今世界，英语是一门非常重要的语言。

en: English is just one of over 2,700 languages in the world today.
zh: 英语只是当今世界2700多种语言中的一种。

en: English has now become the common language of several nations in the world.
zh: 英语现在成了世界上好几个国家的通用语言。

en: English has become an international language.
zh: 英语已经成了一种国际语言。

en: English is a universal language and is used all over the world.
zh: 英语是全球通用语，全世界都在用。

en: English is an international language.
zh: 英语是国际语言。

en: He speaks German, not to mention English.
zh: 他会说德语，更别提英语了。

en: English is taught almost all over the world today.
zh: 现在全世界几乎都在教英语。

en: The English language surrounds us like a sea.
zh: 英语像大海一样包围着我们。

en: English is useful in diplomacy and tourism.
zh: 英语在外交和旅游中非常有用。

en: English is easy to learn.
zh: 英语很好学。

en: English is not difficult to learn.
zh: 英语学起来不难。

en: Where is English spoken?

en: English is a kind of universal language.
zh: 英语算是一种全球通用语。

en: The English language is cognate to the German language.
zh: 英语和德语是同源语言。

en: English is used by many people.
zh: 很多人都在用英语。

en: English is spoken in many countries.
zh: 很多国家都说英语。

en: English is taught in most countries.
zh: 大多数国家都教英语。

en: English is not spoken here.
zh: 这儿不说英语。

en: Is English spoken in Canada?
zh: 加拿大说英语吗？

en: English is spoken in Canada.
zh: 加拿大说英语。

en: English abounds in idioms.
zh: 英语里有很多习语。

en: English is a language abounding in idiomatic expressions.
zh: 英语是一种含有大量习语的语言。

en: English is spoken in America.
zh: 美国说英语。

en: English is too difficult for me to understand.
zh: 英语对我来说太难了，弄不懂。

en: We have English third period.
zh: 我们第三节是英语课。

en: English, as you know, is very much a living language.
zh: 你也知道，英语是一种非常有生命力的语言。

en: She surpasses me in English.
zh: 她的英语比我强。

en: Having studied English, I studied math.
zh: 学完英语后，我又学了数学。

en: How are you getting along with your English study?
zh: 你的英语学得怎么样了？

en: I'll get up your drive for English study.
zh: 我会调动起你学英语的积极性。

en: When you're reading an English book, it isn't a great idea to look up every word you don't know.
zh: 读英文书的时候，没必要每个生词都查字典。

en: In English, the usual sentence structure is Subject - Verb - Object/Complement.
zh: 在英语里，通常的句子结构是主语-谓语-宾语或补语。

en: Some English adverbs function as adjectives.
zh: 有些英语副词也当形容词用。

zh: 我还是掌握不了英语发音的窍门。

en: I can't find any logic to English spelling. "Ghoti'' can be pronounced as 'fish'.
zh: 我觉得英语拼写一点逻辑都没有，“Ghoti”居然能读成“fish”。

en: When it comes to learning English words by heart, nobody can beat him.
zh: 要说背英语单词，谁也比不过他。

en: English words are often borrowed by other languages.

en: A lot of English words are derived from Latin.
zh: 很多英语单词都是从拉丁语演变来的。

en: In addition to English, he can speak French.
zh: 除了英语，他还会说法语。

en: "Why are you studying English so hard?" "To be an English teacher."
zh: “你为什么这么刻苦学英语？”“为了当英语老师。”

en: The future of English seems to be leading in three directions.
zh: 英语的未来似乎有三个发展方向。

en: We listened to the teacher during the English lesson.
zh: 英语课上我们都在听老师讲。

en: In English class, sometimes we sit in a circle to talk about a book we are reading.
zh: 英语课上，我们有时会围坐成一圈讨论正在读的一本书。

en: Do you have an English dictionary?
zh: 你有英语词典吗？

en: Can you do without an English dictionary?
zh: 不用英语词典你行吗？

en: I was called on in English class.
zh: 英语课上我被点名提问了。

en: We wish we didn't have to take a test in English.
zh: 要是不用考英语就好了。

en: The student, who failed in a test in English, was inspired by his friend's words.
zh: 那个英语考试没及格的学生听了朋友的话受到了鼓舞。

en: In English examinations, she always gets good marks, not to say straight As.
zh: 英语考试她总是得高分，更不用说全是A了。

en: If only we didn't have to take a test in English.
zh: 要是不用考英语就好了。

en: I keep a large dictionary close at hand when I read English magazines.
zh: 我读英文杂志的时候，手边总放着一本大字典。

en: Some students like English, and others like physics.
zh: 有些学生喜欢英语，有些则喜欢物理。

en: I would like to be an English teacher.
zh: 我想当一名英语老师。

en: You will derive great benefits from learning English.
zh: 学英语会让你受益匪浅。

en: In addition to English, he speaks German.
zh: 除了英语，他还会说德语。

en: My mark for the English examination was close to the average mark of the class.
zh: 我的英语考试分数跟班级平均分差不多。

en: Did you ever make a speech in English?
zh: 你用英语做过演讲吗？

en: Are you going to take part in the English speech contest?
zh: 你要参加英语演讲比赛吗？

en: The English alphabet has 26 letters.
zh: 英语字母表有26个字母。

en: Try to speak English as often as possible if you want to improve your English.
zh: 如果你想提高英语水平，就尽可能多开口说英语。

en: He is proficient in English.
zh: 他的英语很精通。

en: As far as English is concerned, nobody can beat me.
zh: 就英语而言，没人能比得过我。

en: Many English words are derived from Latin.
zh: 很多英语单词都源自拉丁语。

en: It is estimated that there are over half a million words in English.
zh: 据估计，英语里有超过五十万个单词。

en: Some English words have two spellings - "gray" and "grey", for example.
zh: 有些英语单词有两种拼法，比如 gray 和 grey。

en: Which do you like better, English or music?
zh: 英语和音乐，你更喜欢哪一个？

en: English cannot be mastered overnight.
zh: 英语不是一朝一夕就能掌握的。

en: It is fun to speak in English.
zh: 说英语挺有意思的。

en: Let's speak in English.
zh: 咱们用英语交流吧。

en: I spoke to him in English and found I could make myself understood.
zh: 我用英语跟他说话，发现他能听懂我的意思。

en: No one can match him in English.
zh: 英语方面没人能比得上他。

en: Answer in English.
zh: 用英语回答。

en: Must I answer in English?
zh: 我一定要用英语回答吗？

en: Written in English, this book is easy for me to read.
zh: 因为是用英语写的，这本书对我来说读起来挺容易。

en: You should read books written in English.
zh: 你应该多读读英文原著。

en: Do you have a book written in English?
zh: 你有英文写的书吗？

en: It was not so simple to write a letter in English.
zh: 用英语写封信其实没那么简单。

en: It is difficult to express one's thoughts in English.
zh: 用英语表达自己的想法挺难的。

en: I couldn't make myself understood in English.
zh: 我没法用英语把意思表达清楚。

en: To write a love letter in English is not easy.
zh: 用英语写情书可不容易。

en: We were allowed to speak either in English or in Japanese.
zh: 我们可以用英语说，也可以用日语说。

en: As far as English is concerned, she is second to none in her class.
zh: 论英语，她在班里是数一数二的。

en: In English the verb precedes the object.
zh: 在英语里，动词在宾语前面。

en: In the English language many words contain letters which are not pronounced.
zh: 英语里有很多单词含有不发音的字母。

en: I can't express myself in English very well.
zh: 我不太擅长用英语表达。

en: What do you call this bird in English?
zh: 这种鸟用英语怎么说？

en: Yamada is second to none in English in his class.
zh: 山田的英语在班里是顶尖的。

en: He is second to none in English in his class.
zh: 他的英语水平在班里无人能及。

en: Say it in English.
zh: 用英语说。

en: What do you call this insect in English?
zh: 这种昆虫用英语怎么叫？

en: If only I could speak English!
zh: 我要是会说英语就好了！

en: I wish I could speak English.
zh: 真希望我能说英语。

en: It would be a great convenience if English were to become everybody's major language.
zh: 如果英语能成为每个人的通用语言，那就太方便了。

en: Some are good at English, and others are good at mathematics.
zh: 有些人擅长英语，有些人则擅长数学。

en: There is no denying that English is the most widely spoken language in the world.
zh: 无可否认，英语是世界上使用最广泛的语言。

en: Try to improve your English.
zh: 尽量提高一下你的英语水平吧。

en: It goes without saying that English is an international language.
zh: 英语是国际语言，这是显而易见的。

en: Proficient in English, he is looked on as a good teacher.
zh: 他英语精通，被公认为是一位好老师。

en: My poor English cost me my job.
zh: 我因为英语太差丢了工作。

en: I like English best.
zh: 我最喜欢英语。

en: He can speak either English or French.
zh: 英语和法语他都会说。

en: However, it is good if one can speak English well.
zh: 不过，要是英语能说得好，还是挺有好处的。

en: If you want to be fluent in English, you've got to keep at it.
zh: 要是你想英语说得流利，就得坚持下去。

en: I'd like to master English.
zh: 我想精通英语。

en: The swimmer, Cindy Nicholas, barely made it ashore at Dover at the end of the exhausting swim, but a spokesman from the Channel Swimming Association announced that she was in very good shape.
zh: 游泳选手辛迪·尼古拉斯在那场精疲力竭的游泳结束时，勉强在多佛岸边靠岸，但海峡游泳协会的发言人宣布她的身体状况非常好。

en: How I wish I could swim.
zh: 我多希望我会游泳啊。

en: I wish I could swim.
zh: 我要是会游泳就好了。

en: Do you swim very fast, too?
zh: 你游得也很快吗？

en: It's warm enough to swim.
zh: 天气够暖和了，可以去游泳了。

en: It's much too cold to swim.
zh: 太冷了，没法游泳。

en: I find swimming fun.
zh: 我觉得游泳挺好玩的。

en: It is easy for me to swim.
zh: 游泳对我来说挺简单的。

en: It is easy to swim.
zh: 游泳挺简单的。

en: Swimming is fun for me.
zh: 游泳对我来说很有趣。

en: The swimmer raised his head and gasped for breath.
zh: 那个游泳的人抬起头大口喘着气。

en: It's a cinch to learn to swim.
zh: 学游泳小菜一碟。

en: How about going for a swim?
zh: 去游泳怎么样？

en: How about going swimming?
zh: 要不咱们去游泳吧？

en: Do you feel like going swimming?

en: I should like to go for a swim.
zh: 我想去游泳。

en: If you'd like to continue to improve your swimming, just keep on practicing every day.
zh: 要是你想继续提高游泳水平，就要每天坚持练习。

en: Swimming across the lake almost finished me.
zh: 游过这片湖快把我累瘫了。

en: You may swim.
zh: 你可以去游泳。

en: The swimmers were numb with cold.
zh: 那些游泳的人都被冻僵了。

en: The swimming boy is my brother.
zh: 那个正在游泳的男孩是我弟弟。

en: Years of hardship had not caused him to lose his faith.
zh: 多年的艰辛并没有让他失去信念。

en: Thanks to Mr Nagata.
zh: 多亏了长田先生。

en: They did not have permanent homes, so they did not plant crops for food.
zh: 他们没有固定的住所，所以不种庄稼。

en: Permanent peace is nothing but an illusion.
zh: 永久的和平不过是个幻觉。

en: I will remember your kindness for good.
zh: 我会永远记住你的好。

en: I'm forever lost, can't you see? I'm in a bind!
zh: 我彻底迷失了，你没看见吗？我这会儿正进退两难呢！

en: I will love you always.
zh: 我会永远爱你。

en: I'll be with you forever.
zh: 我会永远陪着你。

en: You have to eat nutritious foods.
zh: 你得吃点有营养的。

en: Good nutrition is vital for an infant's growth.
zh: 良好的营养对婴儿的成长至关重要。

en: I had a sustaining breakfast.
zh: 我吃了一顿很顶饿的早饭。

en: You can't eat it just because it is nutritious.
zh: 你不能光因为有营养就吃它。

en: A man's life has its ups and downs.
zh: 人的一生总有起起落落。

en: The image is out of focus.
zh: 画面没对上焦。

zh: 拍电影是一项很刺激的工作。

en: Would you like to go to a movie?

en: Smoking is not permitted in the cinema.
zh: 电影院里不准抽烟。

en: There were already a lot of people waiting in a line in front of the movie theater.
zh: 电影院门口已经有很多人在排队了。

en: I was at a movie theater.
zh: 我当时在电影院。

en: I was angry about missing that film at the cinema.
zh: 没在电影院看到那部电影，我挺生气的。

en: I take a fancy to seeing movies.
zh: 我特别喜欢看电影。

en: Watching movies is very interesting.
zh: 看电影挺有意思的。

en: What do you say to going to the movies?
zh: 去看看电影怎么样？

en: How about going to the movie?
zh: 去看电影怎么样？

en: I adore going to the cinema.
zh: 我超爱去电影院看电影。

en: I like going to the movies.
zh: 我喜欢看电影。

en: How about going to the movies?
zh: 要不去看看电影？

en: Don't you feel like going to the movies?

en: I'd like to go to the movies.

en: Would you like to take in a movie?

en: It's not like you to cry at movies.
zh: 你看电影竟然看哭了，这可不像你。

en: After seeing the movie, I was impressed.
zh: 看完那部电影，我感触挺深的。

en: Was the movie good?
zh: 电影好看吗？

en: Did you enjoy the movies?
zh: 电影看得开心吗？

en: Do you like movies?
zh: 你喜欢看电影吗？

en: The movie is now showing at a theater near you.
zh: 这部电影正在你附近的影院上映。

en: Did you enjoy the film?
zh: 你觉得那部电影怎么样？

en: When does the movie start?
zh: 电影什么时候开始？

en: Has the movie started yet?
zh: 电影已经开始了吗？

en: The movie got more and more exciting, until at length, people were sitting on the edge of their chairs.
zh: 电影越来越精彩，最后大家都紧张得坐立难安。

en: All the films are boring.
zh: 所有电影都很无聊。

en: The movie was so sad that everybody cried.
zh: 电影太感人了，大家都看哭了。

en: The show was so boring that Ann and I fell asleep.
zh: 演出太没劲了，安和我最后都睡着了。

en: How did you enjoy the movie?
zh: 电影你看得怎么样？

en: Movies often come to a happy end.
zh: 电影通常都有个大团圆结局。

en: The movie starts at ten o'clock.
zh: 电影十点开始。

en: The movie was interesting, as I had expected.
zh: 电影挺有意思的，不出我所料。

en: I think a movie is more entertaining than any book.
zh: 我觉得电影比任何书都更有趣。

en: Some of the movies are exciting.
zh: 有些电影确实挺刺激的。

en: He began to tremble during the movie.
zh: 他在看电影时开始发抖。

en: I would have liked to see the ending of the film, but I had to leave the theater.
zh: 我本想看到电影结束的，但我不得不提前离开。

en: After the movie they fall asleep.
zh: 看完电影后他们就睡着了。

en: I can't see the movie.
zh: 我看不了这部电影。

en: I'd like to set it to the movie channel.
zh: 我想调到电影频道。

en: That's something like a movie scenario.
zh: 那简直就像电影剧本一样。

en: Could you take me to the cinema?
zh: 你能带我去电影院吗？

en: Why not go to the movies?
zh: 为什么不去看看电影呢？

en: How about going to a movie?
zh: 去看场电影怎么样？

en: Which would you rather do, go to the cinema or stay at home?
zh: 你是想去看电影，还是想待在家里？

en: You're going to a movie?
zh: 你要去看电影？

en: I'm going to go to the movies.
zh: 我正准备去看电影。

en: I would rather stay at home than go to the movies.
zh: 我宁愿待在家里也不想去看电影。

en: I don't feel like going to the movies. Let's take a walk instead.
zh: 我不想看电影，咱们去散散步吧。

en: If you go to the movies, take your sister with you.
zh: 如果你去电影院，带上你妹妹。

en: Let's stop off and see a movie.
zh: 咱们顺路去看场电影吧。

en: The movie is popular among the youngsters.
zh: 这部电影在年轻人中很受欢迎。

en: The movie starts.
zh: 电影开始了。

en: The movie was so dull that the audience left one by one.
zh: 电影太乏味了，观众都陆续走光了。

en: The movie "Fight Club" has a surprise ending.
zh: 电影《搏击俱乐部》的结局出人意料。

en: The dinosaurs in the film "Jurassic Park" were true to life.
zh: 《侏罗纪公园》里的恐龙栩栩如生。

en: I was taken aback at the shadow.
zh: 我被那个黑影吓了一跳。

en: We must not speak ill of others behind their backs.
zh: 我们不该在背后说人坏话。

en: You shouldn't talk about Jack behind his back.
zh: 你不该在背后议论杰克。

en: Say it to his face, not behind his back.
zh: 当面跟他说，别在背后说。

en: Our sales performance is just skyrocketing.
zh: 我们的销售业绩简直是在疯涨。

en: What hours is it open?
zh: 几点开门？

en: Our store hours are from 10 to 7.
zh: 我们店的营业时间是10点到7点。

en: What are the business hours?
zh: 营业时间是几点？

en: We need to reorganize it in order to strengthen our business activities.
zh: 我们需要重组一下，好加强业务。

en: Please send your sales reps to this new account.
zh: 请派销售去跟进一下这个新客户。

en: I talked with our sales people.
zh: 我跟销售们谈过了。

en: Mt. Unzen is such a nice place that many people visit there.
zh: 云仙山是个很棒的地方，很多人去那儿旅游。

en: Since it's cloudy with a chance of rain today, we shouldn't go surfing.
zh: 既然今天阴天且可能有雨，我们还是别去冲浪了。

en: The situation is growing serious.
zh: 情况变得越来越严重了。

en: The clouds opened and the sun shone through.
zh: 云散开了，阳光照了进来。

en: A beam of sunlight came through the clouds.
zh: 一束阳光穿过了云层。

en: Not a cloud was to be seen.
zh: 万里无云。

en: What you are saying doesn't make sense.
zh: 你说的话根本不通。

en: Today the sky is a cloudless blue.
zh: 今天晴空万里，一点云都没有。

en: The clouds were driven away by the wind.
zh: 云被风吹散了。

en: Clouds are flying across the sky.
zh: 云在天空中飘过。

en: You can see the sun peeking through the clouds.
zh: 你能看到太阳从云缝里露出来。

en: The moon is invisible behind the clouds.
zh: 月亮躲在云后看不见。

en: The clouds hung low.
zh: 云压得很低。

en: The clouds are rolling away.
zh: 云正在散去。

en: The clouds hid the sun.
zh: 云遮住了太阳。

en: The clouds are breaking.
zh: 云层正在裂开。

en: The clouds cleared up and let the sun shine.
zh: 云散了，阳光照了出来。

en: A cloud passed across the moon.
zh: 一朵云从月亮前面飘过。

en: Clouds sail across the sky.
zh: 云在天空中飘动。

en: A cloud floated across the sky.
zh: 一朵云在天空中飘过。

en: Clouds cast a shadow blacker than the night.
zh: 云层投下的影子比黑夜还要黑。

en: If there were no clouds, we could not enjoy the sun.
zh: 如果没有云，我们也享受不到阳光。

en: The clouds are getting darker.
zh: 云层越来越暗了。

en: The clouds are getting darker; it's going to rain.
zh: 云越来越黑了，要下雨了。

en: By good luck, he was in time for the train.
zh: 运气好，他赶上了火车。

en: Luckily he had enough money to pay the bill.
zh: 幸好他有足够的钱付账。

en: Luckily, he found a good seat.
zh: 幸亏他找了个好位子。

en: Destiny is sometimes cruel.
zh: 命运有时候挺残酷的。

en: It is no use quarreling with fate.
zh: 跟命运较劲没用。

en: I would rather kill myself than reconcile myself to my fate.
zh: 我宁可死也不愿向命运低头。

en: I have little appetite due to lack of exercise.
zh: 运动少了，我都没什么胃口。

en: My muscular strength has weakened from lack of exercise.
zh: 缺乏运动让我的肌肉没劲了。

en: Lack of exercise may harm your health.
zh: 缺乏运动会损害健康。

en: Athletes usually abstain from smoking.
zh: 运动员通常不抽烟。

en: An athlete must keep in good condition.
zh: 运动员必须保持良好的状态。

en: The athletic meet was put off until next week.
zh: 运动会推迟到下周了。

en: The athletes trained hard every day to be at their best for the Summer Olympics.
zh: 运动员们每天刻苦训练，争取在夏季奥运会上发挥出最佳水平。

en: The athletic meeting was put off.
zh: 运动会推迟了。

en: The athletic meet was postponed due to rain.
zh: 因为下雨，运动会延期了。

en: The athletic meet took place on October 15.
zh: 运动会是10月15号开的。

en: The athletic meeting will be put off.
zh: 运动会要推迟。

en: What with having no exercise and being overweight, he had a heart attack.
zh: 因为缺乏运动加上体重超标，他心脏病发作了。

en: Exercise makes your body strong.
zh: 运动能让身体强壮。

en: Exercise is vital for a dog.
zh: 运动对狗狗来说很重要。

en: Exercise, if carried to excess, will do you more harm than good.
zh: 运动要是过量了，反而对身体有害。

en: Exercise is good for your health.
zh: 运动对身体有好处。

en: Exercise is to the body what thinking is to the brain.
zh: 运动之于身体，就像思考之于大脑。

en: You should rest after exercise.
zh: 运动完得休息一下。

en: I ache all over after the exercises.
zh: 运动完我浑身都疼。

en: It is good for you to take exercise.
zh: 多运动对你有好处。

en: You will be more vigorous if you exercise.
zh: 运动能让你更有精神。

en: Too much exercise can do more harm than good.
zh: 运动过量反而没好处。

en: When you exercise your heart beats faster.
zh: 运动的时候心跳会变快。

en: Can I do exercises?
zh: 我能做运动吗？

en: Let's do some exercise to work up an appetite.
zh: 咱们动一动，开开胃。

en: You should do exercise.
zh: 你应该运动运动。

en: It is refreshing to take a shower after exercising.
zh: 运动完洗个澡真舒服。

en: We tend to forget that exercise is a key to good health.
zh: 我们经常会忘，运动才是健康的关键。

en: Exercise trains the muscles.
zh: 运动能锻炼肌肉。

en: Did you have your photograph taken for the driver's license?
zh: 你去拍办驾照用的照片了吗？

en: I hear you had your driver's license canceled.
zh: 听说你的驾照被吊销了。

en: Having a driver's license is an advantage for this job.
zh: 有驾照对这份工作很有优势。

en: Do you have a driver's license?
zh: 你有驾照吗？

en: May I see your driver's license, sir?
zh: 先生，请出示您的驾照。

en: He amazed everyone by passing his driving test.
zh: 他考过了驾照，让大家都挺惊讶。

en: Don't speak to him while he is driving.
zh: 他开车的时候别跟他说话。

en: When you are driving, you should make way for ambulances.
zh: 开车时要给救护车让路。

en: Passengers shall not converse with the driver while the bus is in motion.
zh: 车辆行驶中，请勿与司机交谈。

en: Fasten your seat belts while you are driving.
zh: 开车时请系好安全带。

en: Don't speak to the driver while he is driving.
zh: 司机开车时别跟他说话。

en: Not being watchful, the driver failed to stop in time.
zh: 司机没留神，没能及时停住车。

en: The driver could not distinguish the signal in the fog.
zh: 雾太大，司机看不清信号灯。

en: The driver tipped his cap.
zh: 司机碰了碰帽檐示意。

en: The driver gestured him out.
zh: 司机打手势让他出去。

en: "Well, I guess I'm going to get a driver's license," he answered.
zh: 他回答说：“好吧，我想我得去考个驾照了。”

en: The driver is responsible for the safety of the passengers.
zh: 司机要对乘客的安全负责。

en: The driver accelerated his car.
zh: 司机加速了。

en: A driver was sleeping in the car.
zh: 有个司机在车里睡觉。

en: The driver told us which bus we should take.
zh: 司机告诉了我们该坐哪趟车。

en: A driver is deeply attached to his old car.
zh: 司机对他的老车很有感情。

en: The driver felt like taking a rest.
zh: 司机想休息一下。

en: The driver was thrown from his seat head over heels.
zh: 司机从座位上摔了个倒栽葱。

en: Drivers should wear seat belts.
zh: 司机应该系安全带。

en: The driver turned the wheel to the right.
zh: 司机往右打了方向盘。

en: The driver increased his speed.
zh: 司机加快了速度。

en: The driver asked me which way to go.
zh: 司机问我该走哪条路。

en: The chauffeur will be on duty after 3 o'clock.
zh: 司机三点以后上班。

en: The job of a driver is not as easy as it looks.
zh: 当司机没看起来那么容易。

en: The job of a driver is harder than it looks.
zh: 当司机比看起来要辛苦。

en: The drivers began arguing about who was to blame for the accident.
zh: 司机们开始争论谁该为事故负责。

en: The car crashed because the driver was careless.
zh: 因为司机太粗心，车撞了。

en: The driver ignored the stoplight.
zh: 司机无视了红灯。
